text: Kristina Stolpovskaya (; born 27 May 1986) is a Kazakhstani former footballer who played as a defender. She has been a member of the Kazakhstan women's national team. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Kazakhstani women's footballers Category:Kazakhstan women's international footballers Category:BIIK Kazygurt players Category:CSHVSM-Kairat players
title: Kristina Stolpovskaya
